1.0.name: wordpress/insert-aside
1.0.description:
Often, when a long block of text is being written, secondary content not germane to the paragraph in question is relevant, but out of scope of a given paragraph.

   For example, this is text explaining that the author is using
   far too many words to be useful.

This plugin allows users to write [aside]commentary[aside] and have it rendered appropriately.
